Title: Whereabouts of His Left Arm: The Struggle for Trost, Part 5
Actors: Yuki Kaji, Yui Ishikawa, Marina Inoue, Daisuke Ono
Plot: A miraculous return is met with anger and fear. Cannons are fixed on Eren as he struggles to remember what happened to him inside the belly of a monster and how he ended up humankind's ...
